title: Hunnas Fals Hotel
location: Elkaduwa Road , Warakakanda 120 Wattegama Kandy, Wattegama
details:
House Land Facing Main Road, Car Parking Available, 25 Perches Land, can be constructed a house with two Car Parking.
Clear Deed, Excellent Land value and ideal place for construction of the Small resorts as many resorts and Five Star Hotels available nearest location. Expansion of Kandy Colombo Highway and Hunnas Falls Nuckles Road expansion will increase the value near future. Good for small investors .
